It belongs to the family Primulaceae and is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant features succulent, fleshy leaves that help it retain moisture in its arid habitat. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
